mapper.sql: ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, IS_DELETE, CREATED_AT, SEX, UPDATED_AT, MOBILE, BIRTHDAY, ID_NUMBER, ID_TYPE, EXPERTS_FROM, POLITICS_STATUS, NAYION, GRADUATE_SCHOOL, HIGHT_EDUCATION, MAJOR, WORK_UNIT, FIX_PHONE, FAX, MAKE_TECH_DATE, HEALTH_STATE, ADDRESS, PROFESS_TECH_TITLES, TIME_TO_WORK, TIME_START_WORK, UNIT_ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DEGREE, AT_DUTY, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, PURCHASE_DEP_ID, STATUS, IS_BLACK, HONESTY_SCORE, REL_NAME
mapper.select: select LOGIN_NAME from T_SES_EMS_EXPERT where LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName}

select
from T_SES_EMS_EXPERT where 1=1
AND REL_NAME like '%${relName}%'
AND EXPERTS_FROM = '${expertsFrom}'
AND STATUS = ${status}
AND EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = ${expertsTypeId}
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_EMS_EXPERT (ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, IS_DELETE, CREATED_AT, SEX, UPDATED_AT, MOBILE, BIRTHDAY, ID_NUMBER, ID_TYPE, EXPERTS_FROM, POLITICS_STATUS, NAYION, GRADUATE_SCHOOL, HIGHT_EDUCATION, MAJOR, WORK_UNIT, FIX_PHONE, FAX, MAKE_TECH_DATE, HEALTH_STATE, ADDRESS, PROFESS_TECH_TITLES, TIME_TO_WORK, TIME_START_WORK, UNIT_ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DEGREE, AT_DUTY, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, PURCHASE_DEP_ID, STATUS, IS_BLACK, HONESTY_SCORE, REL_NAME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nayion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hightEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeTechDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{healthState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{professTechTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeToWork,jdbcType=DATE}, #{timeStartWork,jdbcType=DATE}, #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseDepId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isBlack,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{honestyScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_TYPE = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_FROM = #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLITICS_STATUS = #{politicsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAYION = #{nayion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADUATE_SCHOOL = #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGHT_EDUCATION = #{hightEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_UNIT = #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIX_PHONE = #{fixPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKE_TECH_DATE = #{makeTechDate,jdbcType=DATE},
HEALTH_STATE = #{healthState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESS_TECH_TITLES = #{professTechTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_TO_WORK = #{timeToWork,jdbcType=DATE},
TIME_START_WORK = #{timeStartWork,jdbcType=DATE},
UNIT_ADDRESS = #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEGREE = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AT_DUTY = #{atDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_DEP_ID = #{purchaseDepId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_BLACK = #{isBlack,jdbcType=CHAR},
HONESTY_SCORE = #{honestyScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REL_NAME = #{relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_TYPE = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_FROM = #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POLITICS_STATUS = #{politicsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAYION = #{nayion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADUATE_SCHOOL = #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGHT_EDUCATION = #{hightEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_UNIT = #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIX_PHONE = #{fixPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAKE_TECH_DATE = #{makeTechDate,jdbcType=DATE}, HEALTH_STATE = #{healthState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFESS_TECH_TITLES = #{professTechTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_TO_WORK = #{timeToWork,jdbcType=DATE}, TIME_START_WORK = #{timeStartWork,jdbcType=DATE}, UNIT_ADDRESS = #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEGREE = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AT_DUTY = #{atDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASE_DEP_ID = #{purchaseDepId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_BLACK = #{isBlack,jdbcType=CHAR}, HONESTY_SCORE = #{honestyScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REL_NAME = #{relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
